## Fit a Line using `lm` for the following data

```{r}
x <- rpois(500, 6)
hist(x)
y <- -9 * x + 32 + rnorm(500, sd = sqrt(2))
lm_res <- lm(y ~ x) 
summary(lm_res)
sqrt(vcov(lm_res))
sigma(lm_res)^2
```

```{r}
X <- cbind(rep(1, 500), x)
#X[1:50,]
solve(t(X)%*%X) %*% t(X) %*% y  
```
